segments.text: I've just got Bean's new brand image . Let's make a T-shirt line with these pics .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you nuts ? It's the President of the United States in lingerie !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Exactly ! With the war in Iraq , they'll sell like crazy around the world .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's next ? Tony Blair in high heels ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . I'd rather show Bean in a garter belt , but all in good time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Inspiration can come in the strangest ways ...
segments.speaker: S2
